Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — four quatrains (aabb) with internal rhyme in first three lines and with refrain, ‘Ora pro nobis’ and burden: ‘Sancta Maria ora pro nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O moder mylde Mayde vndefyldeThatte we so wylde Be notte
                    begylde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And atte oure ende To graunte vs blysOra pro
                    nobis
